projects.title: Instadroid - Instagram Automation
projects.body: I was inspired by an Instagram automation project, InstaPy by Tim Gro√ümann which automated liking by tag, following, and unfollowing. It uses browser automation which worked well for some time until Instagram was able to detect this. I built Instadroid for Android as an alternative which uses Accessibility API to simulate clicks and scrolls. It features liking by hashtag, following by hashtag, and unfollowing with a safelist to prevent unfollowing friends.

projects.title: Aquarium PAR Database
projects.body: There was a lack of PAR data in the planted aquarium hobby so I decided to test some fixtures and put the data on a website. This site is built with ReactJS frontend with CSS grid to display data tables. The NodeJS/Express backend allows me to create, update, or delete fixture data and upload images.

projects.title: Kawaii Pet Prints
projects.body: I developed this art proofing app to work together with shopify. It works by making a request to a shopify API to get all the current orders. A graphic designer can upload a vectorized art that can be viewed by the customer. The customer can approve the art with a background or request a revision. This is still a work in progress.

projects.title: How Many Jelly Beans?
projects.body: There was a jelly bean guessing activity with several prizes at my work luncheon. At the end of the game, I noticed it took some time to sort through the winners so I thought of creating a web app that would allow players to submit a guess and rank the guesses automatically. I built this app with a ReactJS frontend and NodeJS/Express/Postgres backend. Please allow 1-2 minutes when you click the demo and refresh for the project to build.

projects.title: Portfolio
projects.body: Built using VueJS, this page is organized by 4 main components: Introduction, Terminal, Projects, and Contact. Changes to information on this site can be edited with a single JSON file which is used to render the components.

introduction: Hello world! I am an aspiring web developer. My passion is developing apps that solve unique problems.
education: "B.S. in Mechanical Engineering | University of California, Irvine"
